types.html:
rénoviction f (plural rénovictions)

  1. (Quebec) the eviction of all of a building's tenants on the grounds that a large-scale renovation is planned
    • 2021 May 8, Katie Gagnon, La Presse:
      Deux irréductibles Gaulois résistent, encore et toujours, aux assauts des "rénovictions" qui ont vidé leurs immeubles respectifs.
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)
trans: the eviction of all of a building's tenants on the grounds that a large-scale renovation is planned
